topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/543efab163687234402b0200#post_543efab163687234402b0200
[bq="Princess♠Molestia"]http://www.nytimes.com/2014/10/16/technology/gamergate-women-video-game-threats-anita-sarkeesian.html?_r=0

"Anita Sarkeesian, Video Game Critic, Cancels Speech After Threats of Massacre"

Guy threatened to do a school shooting at a Utah University if Anita Sarkeesian showed up.


...What...the...hell....

 I don't know what SArkeesian opinions are, but there is nothing that could make such a threat. OVER *VIDEO GAMES*... Okay.[/bq]
Sarkeesian believed that games were too manly and women were too oversexualized in them. She's basically a Tumblr Femnist but with more notoriety. Still doesn't excuse the shooting threat though.

"Anita Sarkeesian, Video Game Critic, Cancels Speech After Threats of Massacre"

Guy threatened to do a school shooting at a Utah University if Anita Sarkeesian showed up.


...What...the...hell....

 I don't know what SArkeesian opinions are, but there is nothing that could make such a threat. OVER *VIDEO GAMES*... Okay.[/bq]
Sarkeesian believed that games were too manly and women were too oversexualized in them. She's basically a Tumblr Femnist but with more notoriety. Still doesn't excuse the shooting threat though.[/bq]
